name: Food Girls - Bubbles' Drink Stand VR
storyline:
Bubbles successfully expanded her Bubbles' Drink Stand's business. 
Someday, something unexpected happens out of a sudden! 
All at once, Bubbles have no clue but to seek for your help. 
But then, when opening drink stand, some special scenario happens that makes Madoka feel....
summary: "Just now! Need help from consultants!" Madoka encountered a problem in the new branch. Can the consultant help Madoka get through the difficulties this time?
